title: The Televangelist: A Novel
description: Meet Egypt's top TV preacher Hatem el-Shenawi: a national celebrity revered by housewives and politicians alike for delivering Islam to the masses. Charismatic and quick-witted, he has friends in high places.But when he is entrusted with a secret that threatens to wreak havoc across the country, he is drawn into a web of political intrigue at the very heart of government.Can Hatem's fame and fortune save him from this unspeakable scandal?
author: إبراهيم عيسى
